name: Final Battle
description: Final Battle features an enthralling story with many twists and turns, and a gameplay to satisfy the itch of RPG players. It is a must-have for fans of the old Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
